Return N count in plot legend (treatment)

Source: R/graph_utils.R
plot_display_bign.Rd

Return N count in plot legend (treatment)

Usage

plot_display_bign(datain, mentry_data, bignyn = "Y")

Arguments

datain

Input dataframe for display

mentry_data

Input data from mentry()

bignyn

Display count "(N = )" along with Treatment in plot legend? Values: "Y"/"N"

Value

dataframe with additional variable "TRTTXT" containing the label for Treatment

Examples

data(adsl)
adsl_entry <- adsl |>
  mentry(
    trtvar = "TRT01A",
    trtsort = "TRT01AN",
    trttotalyn = "N",
    add_grpmiss = "N",
    pop_fil = "SAFFL"
  )
msumstat(
  adsl_entry,
  dptvar = "AGE",
  statvar = "mean"
)$gsum |>
  plot_display_bign(adsl_entry)
#> msum success
#> # A tibble: 3 × 6
#>   TRTVAR               mean  DPTVAR CN    DPTVARN TRTTXT                     
#>   <ord>                <chr> <chr>  <chr>   <dbl> <fct>                      
#> 1 Placebo              75.21 AGE    N           1 Placebo (N=86)             
#> 2 Xanomeline Low Dose  75.67 AGE    N           1 Xanomeline Low Dose (N=84) 
#> 3 Xanomeline High Dose 74.38 AGE    N           1 Xanomeline High Dose (N=84)
